release.action: Minimum Java Version is now 11.
Fixed crawler throwing error when issuing a stop command.
New "deferredShutdownDuration" collector configuration option to delay the collector shutdown when it's done executing.
Maven dependency updates: norconex-commons-maven-parent 1.0.2, H2 2.2.220, JSoup 1.15.3.
JMX crawler MBeans are now unregistered as the last thing before collector shutdown.
New MDC attributes which can be used in supporting logging framework: "ctx:crawler.id", "ctx:crawler.id.safe", "ctx:collector.id.safe", and "ctx:collector.id.safe".
Fixed occasional concurrency issue when crawler terminates.
Fixed the crawler sometimes not exiting when done.

release.description: Major release. NOT a drop-in replacement for 1.x.
release.action: Updated transitive dependencies with known vulnerabilities.
The name of the data store engine "storetypes" collection/table has been shorten to just the class "simple" name + "--storetypes".
Updated dependencies to avoid logging library detection conflict.
Updated JdbcDataStoreEngine table name automatic creation to take into account more special characters.
Fixed "maxConcurrentCrawlers" throwing IllegalStateException with "Connection Pool Shut Down" message when different than default value or does not match the number of crawlers.
Fixed JdbcDataStoreEngine#getStoreNames not returning proper names.
Fixed JdbcDataStoreEngine XML configuration being loaded twice.
Fixed MongoDataStore#deleteFirst not successfully deleting and returning the first record.
Fixed data store deserialization not taking into account sub-types, affecting JDBC and MongoDB implementations.
Fixed data store engine resources not being being included as part of the crawler resource cleaning process.
Fixed throwing an error when trying to log the execution summary after the data store engine was closed.
New StopCrawlerOnMaxEventListener class to stop crawlers upon reaching a maximum number of specific crawler events.
New DeleteRejectedEventListener class to delete documents matching specific document "rejected" events.
Added deduplication configuration options via CrawlerConfig#setMetadataDeduplicate and CrawlerConfig#setDocumentDeduplicate
New crawler event: REJECTED_DUPLICATE.
Maven dependency updates: MongoDB Driver 4.3.2, Testcontainers 1.16.0.
Launching crawler now sets crawler name as thread name even before starting to process references.
Metadata checksummer now an element of CrawlerConfig.
Checksummers "targetField", "sourceFields", and "sourceFieldsRegex" are deprecated in favor of "toField" and "fieldMatcher".
RegexMetadataFilter and RegexReferenceFilter have been deprecated in favor or MetadataFilter and ReferenceFilter.
Checksummers "disabled" flag deprecated in favor of setting a null checksummer or using a self-closed checksummer tag in config.
Fixed invalid configuration in POM "maven-dependency-plugin".
Added JdbcDataStoreEngine as a data store implementation.
Added "crawlersStartInterval" configuration option.
New crawler events: DOCUMENT_QUEUED, DOCUMENT_PROCESSED.
JMX reporting now returns active references and event counts.
Now provides execution summary and the end of a crawler execution.
Removed JEF dependency in favor of improved JMX for tracking.
Now supports providing multiple committers.

New collector events: COLLECTOR_RUN_BEGIN, COLLECTOR_RUN_END, COLLECTOR_STOP_BEGIN, COLLECTOR_STOP_END, COLLECTOR_CLEAN_BEGIN, COLLECTOR_CLEAN_END, COLLECTOR_STORE_EXPORT_BEGIN, COLLECTOR_STORE_EXPORT_END, COLLECTOR_STORE_IMPORT_BEGIN, COLLECTOR_STORE_IMPORT_END
New crawler events: CRAWLER_INIT_BEGIN, CRAWLER_INIT_END, CRAWLER_RUN_BEGIN, CRAWLER_RUN_END, CRAWLER_STOP_BEGIN, CRAWLER_STOP_END, CRAWLER_CLEAN_BEGIN, CRAWLER_CLEAN_END.
New method on CrawlerEvent: isCrawlerShutdown.
New UNSUPPORTED crawl state.
New Collector#clean() method and related events.
New Collector#exportDataStore(), Collector#importDataStore() methods and related events.
New .core.reference package along with new .core.store package for storing of URL crawling information.
New IDataStoreEngine accessible from crawler to store any kind of objects by implementors in their own extensions.

AbstractDocumentChecksummer and AbstractMetadataChecksummer classes (and their subclasses) now have an "onSet" configurable option for dictating how values are set: append, prepend, replace, optional.
New CrawlDoc, CrawlDocInfo, and CrawlDocMetadata (either new or renamed).
New Crawler#isQueueInitialized() method to support asynchronous reference queueing.
Now logging throughput (documents per seconds) and estimated remaining time.
Now always resume previous incomplete executions. Can now "clean" to start fresh.
Now using XML class from Norconex Commons Lang for loading/saving configuration.
Now using SLF4J for logging.
Lists are now replacing arrays in most places.
ICollector, ICollectorConfig, ICrawler, ICrawlerConfig were all replaced with Collector, CollectorConfig, Crawler, and CrawlerConfig.
Default working directory structure has been modified.
Path is used in addition/instead of File in many places.

Configurable CollectorLifeCycleListener, IJobLifeCycleListener, IJobErrorListener, ISuiteLifeCycleListener, ICrawlerEventListener all replaced with IEventListener. These new listeners can be set on the collector configuration, or be implemented on configuration objects and automatically be detected.
Dependency updates: Norconex Importer 3.0.0, Norconex JEF 5.0.0, Norconex Commons Lang 2.0.0, Norconex Committer 3.0.0, H2 1.4.197.
CrawlerConfig#OrphanStrategy is now public.
Now requires Java 8 or higher.

Command-line arguments are now different, with more options such as "cleaning" previous executions, importing/exporting the crawl store and forcing a commit of any remains from committer queue, rendering of configuration file once interpreted, etc.
Now use simple file-locks to prevent running conflicting commands concurrently.
Dates now takes the zone into consideration.
Collector "maxParallelCrawlers" is now deprecated in favor of "maxConcurrentCrawlers".
Removed "data" package in favor of "reference" package.
Removed some of the deprecated code from 1.x.
Removed CRAWLER_RESUMED crawler event.

Removed CollectorConfigLoader, CollectorLifeCycleListener, CrawlerLifeCycleListener, IJobLifeCycleListener, IJobErrorListener, ISuiteLifeCycleListener, ICrawlerEventListener (replaced by IEventListener).
Remove all previously available crawl store implementions in favor of new MVStoreDataStore.
